title: THEORY: The Walking Dead is Setting Up a Grimes Family Endgame
author: Reel Talk
comment: I can’t wait for richonne to reunite et Rick see his son Rj 🥺
You literally cover everything I love from TWD to saw I just subscribed
The story had so much potential, didn't need to end after Rick's death. Hope to see a concurrent series in the future, from Negan's perspective would be interesting.
Am I the only one who didn’t care for rick and michonne relationship?
I've read the comics, the tv show is better, controversial?
description:
THEORY: The Walking Dead Setting Up a Grimes Family Endgame. With the introduction of Hershel in Season 10C of TWD, it seems clearer than ever that the TV show can't have the same ending as the comic books. Is it possible that the show has been setting up an endgame involving the Grimes children all this time? Let's discuss!
